item.description:
Everything is a choice, wouldn't you agree? The choice is yours. To come or not to come. I appreciate the fact that you don't know what you don't know, but I do know what you don't know. There is no other way to try to explain this to you...so you get to come and see and experience it for yourself. The choice is yours.

 

So if you are a part of my meet up group I am assuming you are entreprenuerial. If that is you and you are looking to enhance your life, I can help. Call me to discuss your personal goals and I will prove to you how by attending this event that I can help you with those goals, fair enough? Looking forward to hearing from you sooner than later as I am limiting the attendence to this event.

group.name: The Boston Millionaire Total Empowerment Meetup Group

item.name: RSVP: To me for more information
